articles.author: Pranati Deva
articles.title: Varun Beverages shares crash 7% after June quarter results, stock split and dividend announcements | Stock Market News - Mint
articles.description: Shares of Varun Beverages crashed around 7 percent in intra-day deals today, July 30, even after it posted decent results for the quarter ended June 2024 (Q2CY24). The firm also announced a stock split and an interim dividend with the results.
